description: We offer an extensive range of dormer bungalow designs, covering a wide array of shapes and sizes. We include any house designs of one-and-a-half or one-and-three-quarter storeys in this collection. All of our dormer bungalow designs make use of roof space in either some or all of the property, even if they feature a full two-storey wing at the front of the house. With advances in building technologies negating the need for roof joists, what was previously wasted attic or loft space can now be utilised for additional bedrooms. The advantage of a one-and-a-half storey home over a two-storey home is that the roof's ridge height is considerably lower, which may be useful when seeking planning permission in certain areas.
name: Dormer Bungalows
